title: Tempest Domain
content:
Level 1 - Martial Weapon Proficiency (Subclass Feature) Level 1 - Wrath of the Storm (Subclass Feature) Level 2 - Destructive Wrath (Subclass Feature) Level 3 - Domain Spells (Shatter, Gust of Wind) Level 5 - Domain Spells (Call Lightning, Sleet Storm) Level 6 - Thunderous Strike (Subclass Feature) Level 7 - Domain Spells (Ice Storm, Freedom of Movement) Level 8 - Divine Strike: Thunder (Action) Level 9 - Domain Spells (Insect Plague, Destructive Wave)

BG3 Tempest Domain - CLERIC SPELL SLOTS
